overview.description: Hero Gear is equipment worn by individual heroes that boosts hero stats and provides troop command buffs. Unlike Chief Gear (which is global), Hero Gear only affects the equipped hero.
overview.class_specificity_note: All hero gear is troop-type specific (Infantry, Lancer, or Marksman). An Infantry hero can only equip Infantry-type hero gear. The game auto-filters compatible options.

gear_slots.description: 4 standard gear slots available to all heroes. Each slot provides different stat combinations.
gear_slots.note_on_naming: Different sources use different names. The wiki and in-game use Goggles/Gauntlets/Belt/Boots. Some community sources use Headgear/Gloves/Belt/Boots or Helmet/Armor/Weapon/Accessory. The official in-game names are Goggles, Gauntlets, Belt, Boots.

class_variants.description: All 4 slots exist for each troop class. The stats are the same per slot but the troop command buffs apply only to the matching troop type.
class_variants.infantry: Infantry Goggles, Infantry Gauntlets, Infantry Belt, Infantry Boots - buffs Infantry troops
class_variants.lancer: Lancer Goggles, Lancer Gauntlets, Lancer Belt, Lancer Boots - buffs Lancer troops
class_variants.marksman: Marksman Goggles, Marksman Gauntlets, Marksman Belt, Marksman Boots - buffs Marksman troops

quality_tiers.description: Hero gear comes in 7 quality tiers (sometimes called rarity). Higher tiers provide better base stats and unlock advanced systems.

tiers.name: Grey
tiers.notes: Lowest tier. Cannot be enhanced. Used only as sacrifice material for XP.

tiers.name: Green
tiers.notes: Basic tier. Can be enhanced but no mastery forging.

tiers.name: Blue
tiers.notes: Mid-tier gear. Enhancement provides decent stat boosts.

tiers.name: Purple
tiers.notes: Good mid-game gear. High sacrifice value.
tiers.how_to_obtain: Exploration stages (high levels), Arena shop, events

tiers.name: Gold
tiers.notes: Best obtainable base tier. Unlocks Mastery Forging at Enhancement Level 20. Also called 'Mythic' in some contexts. This is the tier tracked in the database as quality=5.
tiers.how_to_obtain: Arena shop (Gold-quality drops), packs, Legendary Hero Gear via day 40 server milestone
tiers.ascension_path: At Enhancement 100 + Mastery 10, can ascend to Legendary tier using 2 Mythic gear pieces

tiers.name: Legendary
tiers.notes: Ascended from Gold/Mythic gear. Requires Enhancement Level 100, Mastery Level 10, and 2 Mythic gear pieces to ascend. Server must be active for a certain number of days.

empowerment.description: Legendary gear can be empowered at milestone levels (20, 40, 60, 80, 100)

naming_confusion.description: The community and different sources use inconsistent naming for tiers. The in-game color-based names (Grey/Green/Blue/Purple/Gold) are most reliable. 'Mythic' can refer to either Gold-tier hero gear or the Mythic upgrade path. 'Legendary' or 'Red' refers to the ascended tier. The codebase uses two different mapping schemes.
naming_confusion.known_inconsistency: Frontend maxes at 6 (Legendary) while backend engine has 7 (Mythic). The MythicGearEditor component handles exclusive gear separately.

enhancement_system.description: Enhancement increases gear stats by spending Enhancement XP Components or sacrificing other hero gear pieces.
xp_sources: Sacrificing other hero gear (Grey=10, Green=30, Blue=60, Purple=150 XP)
Note: Mythic Gears CANNOT be used as sacrifice material

xp_per_level.description: XP required to reach each enhancement level (1-100). Costs scale roughly linearly with acceleration at higher levels.

reforge.description: Enhancement Reforge resets gear to Enhancement Level 0
reforge.refund: 100% of all XP and items used

mastery_forging.description: Advanced enhancement system exclusive to Gold (Mythic) quality gear and above. Provides a percentage-based multiplier buff to all gear stats including base Gear Strength and all other buffs.
mastery_forging.resource: Essence Stones (levels 1-20) + Mythic Hero Gear pieces (levels 11-20)

reforge.description: Mastery Reforge resets mastery level AND sets enhancement back to Level 0
reforge.warning: Also resets Enhancement Level to 0! This is destructive - you lose enhancement progress too.

legendary_ascension.description: Ascend Gold/Mythic gear to Legendary (Red) tier. The ascended gear starts at Enhancement Level 1 with improved base stats.

unlock_requirements.server_age: Server must be active for a certain number of days (exact days not confirmed)
unlock_requirements.sacrifice_note: 2 additional Mythic Hero Gear pieces are consumed in the ascension process

post_ascension.empowerment_note: Legendary gear can be empowered at milestone levels requiring Legendary Gear pieces and Mithril

empowerment_milestones.description: At specific enhancement levels, Legendary gear requires additional resources beyond XP to progress

xp_range.pattern: Approximately 50 XP increase per level between milestones

legendary_ascension.reforged_mythic_note: Reforged Mythic Gear can be used as material for both Gear Ascension and Empowerment

exclusive_gear.description: A 5th gear slot available only to Legendary (SSR/Gold rarity) heroes. Each hero has a unique exclusive gear piece with a unique name and exclusive skills. Exclusive gear is separate from the 4 standard gear slots.

unlock_requirements.hero_rarity: Legendary (SSR/Gold) - NOT available for Rare or Epic heroes
unlock_requirements.widget_type: Hero-specific Widgets (e.g., Molly needs Molly Widgets)

exclusive_skills.skill_1: Unlocked when exclusive gear is first obtained (level 1)
exclusive_skills.skill_2: Unlocked when exclusive gear reaches level 2

exclusive_gear.transferability: Exclusive gear is hero-specific and CANNOT be transferred to other heroes

gear_transferability.description: Hero gear transfer and equip/unequip rules

standard_gear_transfer.restriction: Can only transfer between heroes of the SAME troop type (e.g., Infantry gear only goes on Infantry heroes)
standard_gear_transfer.cost: Free - no gems or resources to unequip/re-equip
standard_gear_transfer.notes: The game auto-filters to show only compatible gear for each hero's class. Unequipping does not affect state transfer score.

exclusive_gear_transfer.notes: Exclusive gear is permanently tied to a specific hero and cannot be moved to another hero

essence_stone_sources.description: Where to obtain Essence Stones for Mastery Forging

gear_acquisition_methods.description: How to obtain hero gear at different quality tiers

methods.notes: Higher exploration levels drop better quality gear. Idle rewards and stage completion.
Up to 5 Arena battles per day. Win for random gear drops and Arena tokens (300/day from all 5 battles).
Purchase with Arena tokens earned from battles.
Paid packs are a primary source of Gold-quality gear.
Legendary Hero Gear becomes available around server day 40.

stat_types_explained.description: Hero Gear provides two categories of stats: Hero Stats and Command Stats

hero_stats.description: Directly affect the hero character in combat (exploration, arena, etc.)

command_stats.description: Affect the troops under the hero's command. These are the 'Troop' buffs.
command_stats.class_restriction: Command buffs only apply to the troop type matching the gear class (Infantry gear buffs Infantry troops only)

investment_strategy.description: Hero gear investment priority relative to Chief Gear and spending profile
investment_strategy.core_rule: Chief Gear should ALWAYS be prioritized over Hero Gear for most players. Chief Gear is global (all heroes, all modes). Hero Gear is single-hero, conditional.

roi_by_context.field_pvp: HIGH - Hero gear has maximum impact in 1v1 field battles
roi_by_context.arena: HIGH - Individual hero stats matter greatly
roi_by_context.rally_leader: MEDIUM - Your 3 heroes benefit, but expedition skills matter more
roi_by_context.rally_joiner: VERY LOW - Only your single joiner skill matters, gear barely contributes
roi_by_context.garrison: LOW - Damage reduction skills matter more than raw stats

anti_patterns: Gearing rally joiner heroes (Jessie, Sergey) - their skill is what matters, not gear stats
Investing in hero gear before all 6 Chief Gear pieces are at the same tier
Gearing heroes that will be replaced by next generation

codebase_mapping.description: How hero gear is represented in the WoS Optimizer codebase

database_model.note: Slot numbers 1-4 map to Goggles/Gauntlets/Belt/Boots respectively. The field names use 'mythic_gear' prefix for exclusive gear (historical naming).

codebase_mapping.mastery_visibility_rule: Mastery stepper shown when quality >= 5 (Gold) AND level >= 20

open_questions.question: What are the exact enhancement level caps per quality tier? Can Green/Blue/Purple gear truly reach level 100, or do they have lower caps?
open_questions.current_assumption: All quality tiers share the 100 level cap based on the universal max level. Grey cannot be enhanced at all.
open_questions.notes: Multiple sources confirm max level 100 without specifying per-tier caps. The wiki says Grey cannot be enhanced. Green/Blue/Purple likely have the same 100 cap as Gold.

open_questions.question: What is the exact server age requirement for Legendary gear ascension?
open_questions.current_assumption: Around 40+ days based on server milestones
open_questions.notes: Official help center says 'server must be active for a certain number of days' without specifying

open_questions.question: Is there a full XP table for Legendary gear empowerment levels (separate from standard enhancement XP)?
open_questions.current_assumption: XP ranges from 2,500 to 9,300 per level with ~50 XP increase between milestones

open_questions.question: What exactly do the Mastery Forging percentage boosts look like per level?
open_questions.current_assumption: Unknown exact percentages per mastery level
open_questions.notes: Sources confirm it provides a % buff to all gear stats but no source lists exact percentages per level

open_questions.question: The frontend maps quality 5=Gold and 6=Legendary (max 6). The backend engine has 7=Mythic. Are there 6 or 7 quality tiers in the current game?
open_questions.current_assumption: 6 playable tiers (Grey through Legendary/Red). The backend '7=Mythic' may be legacy or for future use.
open_questions.notes: Need to reconcile frontend (max 6) vs backend (max 7) quality mappings
